caption: A group of people in the hallway found their path blocked by an iron door. They lifted a sofa and used it to force the door open. On the deck, a crowd gathered, and lifeboats were filled to capacity with people in life jackets, eagerly trying to board. As the lifeboats were slowly lowered into the water, a group of people on the deck began playing violins. The cruise ship was now partially submerged. A woman and a man exchanged glances. Eventually, the woman boarded a lifeboat. Suddenly, she returned from the lifeboat to the ship. She rushed into the cabin and began running. A man followed her, going down the stairs. The two of them embraced and shared a passionate kiss.
